classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
description: This introductory studio functions as a survey of typographic practice across media platforms. Students relate typographic form to reading conventions and reproduction technologies. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
label: Typographic Practice
